meanings.definition: The highest point or top of something.
meanings.sent1: The tiptop of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The hiker reached the tiptop after a long climb.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel built its nest at the tiptop of the tree.
meanings.sent4: The tiptop of the skyscraper seemed to touch the clouds.
meanings.sent5: From the tiptop, you could see the entire city below.

meanings.definition: Excellent or outstanding in quality or condition.
meanings.sent1: She received a tiptop grade on her test.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a tiptop meal for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked tiptop after grooming itself.
meanings.sent4: The tiptop performance received a standing ovation.
meanings.sent5: The tiptop service at the hotel made the guests feel special.
